channel.title: 508 help urgent please!
channel.description:
I can't create an admin account on Berky-Scape 508 server.
Whenever i try to change my 'rights' to 2, and my skills to 99, it resets my account ! I cant use ::giveitem either to get cash. How do i make myself an admin without my account automatically changing my account back to level 3 :confused: :confused: :confused: ?
No sarcastic answers please (like 'play it properly' etc).
Thanks, CuriousGeorge
P.S Whenever i edit it in RTF format, i save it then it changes the password to a random number, so when i try to log in after the changes, it says invalid username or password ! Its soooo annoying !

item.title: 508 help urgent please!
item.dc:creator: @Snaz Snaz
item.description:
@Snaz wrote:

to make yourself an admin go into your login.class and look for

if (p.username.

it will say this:

if (p.username.equals("Snaz")) { p.rights = 2; }

Change the Snaz to your username and p.rights to what player rights you want.

hope this helps.

Read full topic

item.title: 508 help urgent please!
item.dc:creator: @curiousgeorge curiousgeorge
item.description:
@curiousgeorge wrote:

I can’t create an admin account on Berky-Scape 508 server.

Whenever i try to change my ‘rights’ to 2, and my skills to 99, it resets my account ! I cant use ::giveitem either to get cash. How do i make myself an admin without my account automatically changing my account back to level 3 ?

No sarcastic answers please (like ‘play it properly’ etc).

Thanks, CuriousGeorge

P.S Whenever i edit it in RTF format, i save it then it changes the password to a random number, so when i try to log in after the changes, it says invalid username or password ! Its soooo annoying !

Read full topic
